data.title: A personal website
data.content: With the use of [Next.js](https://nextjs.org), a react framework, I've built this website. This website is written in JavaScript in conjuction with CSS from the [Pure CSS Framework](http://purecssframework.com).

data.title: A Telegram-bot written in Python
data.content: On Telegram I've made a bot, by using the [Python-telegram-bot wrapper](https://python-telegram-bot.org/). At the moment it can look up the weather, send you memes from reddit and has several answers to text the user sends it. The bot is reachable on Telegram at [@Rob_Ot](https://t.me/Rob_Ot_bot). The code for it is [avaiable on Github](https://github.com/pimvh/telegrambot_simple).
